Text:
Khadijah was supportive of Muhammad's prophetic mission, always helping in his work, proclaiming his message and belittling any opposition to his prophecies

#DemiseOfLadyKhadija

When the polytheists and aristocrats of the Quraysh harassed the Muslims, 
Hazrat Khadija(s.a)  used her money to ransom Muslim slaves and feed the Muslim community.

#DemiseOfLadyKhadija

"SHE BELIEVES IN ME WHEN
    OTHER REJECTED ME"
    _HOLY PROPHET(pbuh)_

#DemiseOfLadyKhadija
